title: PBE download never working?
body: It always goes to 33% and drops down to 15ish kbps then to 0 and then randomly goes up to 1-27 and then goes to like 34%. It stays there for 3+ hours??!!??!

replies.body: At this stage, the patcher is downloading and updating game files but your network is having problems maintaining a connection to the patching server.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and restore your connection.  That should get you squared away!
